participants.name: Randall Layman
participants.title: Senior Talent Acquisition Consultant at Worldpay

messages.message:
Interested in a Software Developer Opportunity (Tempe,AZ) - FullTime

Hi Brian, 

Just wanted to send you a quick note. Your background really stood out to me as someone they would like to speak with. It's a full-time software development position located in Tempe.

Our client is in the payments industry that has a great working environment, brand-new offices, flexible hours, 401k, full benefits paid, and more. I'd like to learn more about your current role and technologies you have experience with. 

Do you have 5-10 minutes this morning/afternoon to discuss in more in-detail?

Best,

Randall Layman
Sr. Recruiter | Fintech Division
706.877.0402 | randall.layman@tekstream.com
